data.title: Employees: Retirement Planning - Montgomery County Public Schools
data.text:
Employee and Retiree Service Center → Employees → Retirement planning → MCPS retirement workshops

Retirement Informational Sessions and Forms Workshops

Virtual Retirement Informational and Forms Webinars

(Recorded)

Retirement Informational Webinar Part 1—Understanding Your Retirement

Retirement Informational Webinar Part 1—Understanding Your Retirement | closed captioned, use passcode Tsvc9+%5

Retirement Informational Webinar Part 2—Benefits Options at Retirement

Retirement Informational Webinar Part 2—Benefits Options at Retirement | closed captioned coming soon

Retirement Forms Webinar

Retirement Forms Webinar | closed captioned, use passcode #50+w95u

In-person Events

Informational Sessions

The Employee and Retiree Service Center (ERSC) conducts Understanding Your Retirement Informational Sessions for employees who are considering retirement within the next two years. Topics for each informational session include a timeline for retirement, eligibility, benefit formulas, leave, post-retirement health and life insurance, taxes, and forms. ERSC staff are available at the sessions to answer questions and assist members with the retirement process.

To attend an Informational Session, you will need to register for course number 91977 at Professional Development Online (PDO).

Be sure to log in to and visit PenPoint, a self-service retirement system for MCPS employees, where you can determine your pension plan membership prior to attending a Retirement Information Session. In addition, you may find it helpful to review Understanding Your Retirement, a booklet that will guide your through the retirement process.

Forms Workshops

After attending one of ERSC's informational sessions and downloading your retirement forms, you may want to attend an ERSC Retirement Forms Workshop. During these workshops, ERSC staff members present all required retirement forms, explain how to complete them, and answer questions. If you are retiring within the next year, you are encouraged to attend a Forms Workshop. You need to attend an Informational Session prior to attending a Forms Workshop.

To attend, you will need to register for course number 90593 at Professional Development Online (PDO).

Schedule for the 2023-2024 School Year:

Informational Sessions

Forms Workshops
